data.title: Jon Gordon on LinkedIn: “Most relationships initially break down because of poor communication…
data.meta_description:
“Most relationships initially break down because of poor communication. Where there is a void in communication, negativity will fill it.” 

Communicate…
data.text:
Start your week off FUELED UP! ⛽️🔥 Download this FREE resource to help you: - Feed The Positive 🙌 - Uplift Your Mind👆 - Encourage Others 💪 - Love It and Conquer Fear👏 Click the link to get yours now! 👇 www.jongordon.com/fuel

Was in the great state of Iowa today speaking to the Iowa Hawkeyes. Amazing culture, leaders and program! So many great guys on this team that I’ve gotten to know personally. Excited to see how they compete, connect, commit and grow. Was an honor to speak to them!

We loved Maine! Flew in to Portland and ate lobster rolls. Went to see our friends Ed and Kristianna Mylett. Then went to Camden and ate lobster rolls. Then our friend Billy Bush picked us up on the boat and took us to his place in North Haven where the pickleball was intense. Then we went to Kennebunkport, stayed at the Colony and ate lobster rolls.

It’s time to Create your Positive Advantage. Join us for our IN PERSON Day of Development event, October 3rd in Dallas! You’ll learn proven strategies to develop confidence, improve your leadership and build a connected and committed team. You’ll leave with a action plan to supercharge your growth and results. Attend alone or with your team. Click the link below now to secure your spot! 👇 https://lnkd.in/evp2kjb9

In this episode of The Jon Gordon Podcast, I share strategies to develop mental toughness, optimize mental health and create a better you. Don’t miss out on this short, insightful podcast! Click here to listen now!👇 https://lnkd.in/eRmhiKeu
